nodes.text: Team Watto was a Podracing team helmed by the Toydarian Watto in 22 BBY. Watto had since come into possession of the Podracer once used by his old slave, Anakin Skywalker, and had planned to use it to enter the 22 BBY race season with. Watto lacked a pilot, however. While Watto did eventually find a pilot, and although the team was not well regarded initially, it eventually became fairly successful, scoring numerous victories.

The team received help from the Nosaurian pilot Clegg Holdfast up until he was killed during a race by Aldar Beedo, a Glymphid hit-man, on the planet of Coruscant. Beedo also happened to be working for the rival team known as Team Sebulba.
